name: Rock Paper Scissors - One Button Accessible Game
name_original: Rock Paper Scissors - One Button Accessible Game
description:
Rock Paper Scissors  - One Button Accessible Game

All my games can be played with a single input. It is set to use the left mouse button. If you require any other input type or device, visit my website to request a custom version: OneButtonGames

Please also consider supporting me on Patreon
